mapper.select: SELECT record.*,record_treatmentcar.id rid,record_treatmentcar.record_id,record_treatmentcar.treatmentcar_id,site.id sid,site.site_name,site.serial_number,site.address,site.telephone telephoneOfSite,car.id cid,car.license,car.driver_id,user.id uid,user.realname,user.telephone FROM record LEFT JOIN site ON record.site_id=site.id LEFT JOIN record_treatmentcar ON record.id=record_treatmentcar.record_id LEFT JOIN car ON record_treatmentcar.treatmentcar_id=car.id LEFT JOIN user ON car.driver_id=user.id ORDER BY record.allocation_time DESC
